items.title: Why the Zune never killed the iPod
items.summary: The Microsoft Zune is mostly just a footnote in tech history. Microsoft spent years - and vast sums of money - trying to create a true competitor to Apple's iPod, without ever coming close to actually pulling it off. The Zune was simply too little, too late. You know what's surprising about the Zune, though? […]

This weekly roundup pulls together all of the Steals from the past week, and puts them in a digestable list for you to consume every Saturday morning. During the last week of October reader favorites ranged from this standout Milanese Loop-style Apple Watch band at $10 to a smartphone lanyard that doubles as a USB-C cable for $7, and finally, these corduroy sweatshirts priced from $18.50. You can find these plus a whole lot more down below.

more…

items.title: Check out Nordstrom’s now live early holiday sale: Up to 50% off things you’ll actually want
items.summary:
Even though the sales page says “Holiday Gifts”, don’t be fooled, there’s actually some seriously good marked down stuff worth checking out. You can browse the full sale lineup which includes some everyday basics mixed with some high-end wardrobe upgrades up to 50% off. Shop the entire sale here.

items.title: Lenovo’s budget-friendly 2025 Idea Tab Plus Android tablet with 90Hz display hits new $200 all-time low, more from $130
items.summary:
As part of its now live early Black Friday sale, Best Buy is offering a handful of Lenovo Android tablets at some of the best prices we have tracked for them. One of the more notable deals of the lot gets you the brand’s 2025 Idea Tab Plus Android tablet for $199.99 shipped. This particular model hit the scene earlier this year carrying a $290 price tag, and this unit here without the included Lenovo Pen typically goes for $270. Today’s deal at Best Buy takes $70 off its usual going rate, to mark the lowest price we have tracked for it. Alternatively, you can score the variant with an included stylus for $219.99 shipped from Lenovo. A handful of other Lenovo Android tablets are also discounted right now at both Best Buy and directly at Lenovo, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

more…

Now that Halloween has led us into November, access to LEGO’s newest building sets are opening up for Insiders ahead of general release in the coming days. This month is more focused on the upcoming Insiders Weekend and Black Friday events, and as such we’re only seeing two sets – plus some GWPs – stocking the shelves, but boy are they heavy hitters.
